name: galactic-key
effect: Grants access to Galactic HQ in Veilstone City.
short_effect: Grants access to Galactic HQ in Veilstone City.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A card key for disengaging security
systems in the Galactic HQ. Losing it
can result in punishment, apparently.
